description: The Descriptor cluster is meant to replace the support from the Zigbee Device NOTE Object (ZDO) for describing a node, its endpoints and clusters. This cluster describes an endpoint instance on the node, independently from other endpoints, but also allows composition of endpoints to conform to complex device type patterns.

0x0000.name: Device­
